body.name: SSK Portable SSD 2TB External Drive, Up to 1050MB/s Extreme Solid State Drive, USB C 3.2 Gen2 NVME Protocol External SSD Drive for Type-c Smartphone,PS5,Xbox, Laptop,MacBook/Pro/Air and More
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 16 hrs 27 mins
features: 【2TB Extreme Portable NVME SSD】: SSK NVMe Solid State Drive performance featuring up to 1050MB/s read and 1000MB/s write speed, transfer massive files in seconds.Let you move hi-res photos and videos fast (Actual speed depending on drive capacity, host device, OS and application);
【Strong Performance】: Adopts high performance controller IC, Complies with UASP, Trim which can effectively improve the speed and extend the lifetime of SSD;

【Universal Compatibility】: Support Windows, MacOS, Linux, Android. This external solid state drive includes USB C to A cable and USB C to C cable, So the SSD is not only applicable to conventional USB A port computer devices, but also suitable for USB C smart phones,PS5,xBOX,Laptops and macbook ect.It is backward compatible with USB3.0/USB2.0;

【Portable Design】: SSK Mini portable SSD is made of 2mm thick aluminum alloy material,the surrounding area is made of engineering-grade ABS, which has good toughness. Size: 2.70" x 1.48" x 0.49" and weight 0.18lb, you can easily put this Portable SSD in your briefcase, backpack or the carrying bag;

【Safe & Reliable】: Store your photos, videos, music and files quickly and safely. SSK portable ssd drive has excellent shock-proof and anti-vibration,lower power consumption and dissipates heat quickly to achieve reliable data transmission; Waterproof and dustproof functions better protect your data.
body.description: Perfect Storage Solution, on the GO Mini Portable NVME SSD The light, pocket-sized SSK portable NVME SSD delivers extreme speed with easy and reliable data storage for transferring large files. It is the perfect storage solution for anyone on the go. Excellent storage capacity to backup and share your valuable files, photos, videos, etc. Technology allows you to enjoy better freedom. Interface: USB3.2 Gen 2 NVME 10Gbps 1 x USB C to USB C Gen2 10Gbps Cable (150MM) 1 x USB A to USB C Gen 2 10Gbps Cable (150MM) Available Capacity:250GB,500GB,1TB,2TB for your choice

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 867 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: USB3.2 Gen 2 Extreme NVME Solid State Drive Embedded USB3.2 Gen 2 PCIe NVMe Technology, experience up to 1050 MB/s read speed and 1000 MB/s write speed, send 2GB 4K UHD video files from the storage SSD to your PC in just 2 seconds , Let you work and play more efficiently. Please Note: 1. In order to get the read and write speed 1050MB/s&1000 MB/s, please ensure the USB interface of the computer and the USB data cable are both USB 3.2 Gen 2 10Gbps standard; 2. The Writing Speed remains stable when the file size of each transfer is less than 20GB. 3. If connect to a USB3.0 or USB3.1 Gen1 5Gbps port, the transfer speed will be limited up to 450MB/s. 4. The Computer and USB SSD have Different Capacity Calculation Algorithms. The Computer 1G=1024M, USB SSD 1G=1000M, so the USB SSD's Capacity Displayed on the Computer is about 90% of the Actual Identification.

SSK products are constructed to the highest standards and rigorously tested. You can be confident in the outstanding quality, performance and reliability of every SSK products. Perfect Storage Solution, on the GO Mini Portable NVME SSD The light, pocket-sized SSK portable NVME SSD delivers extreme speed with easy and reliable data storage for transferring large files. It is the perfect storage solution for anyone on the go. Excellent storage capacity to backup and share your valuable files, photos, videos, etc. Technology allows you to enjoy better freedom. Interface: USB3.2 Gen 2 NVME 10Gbps 1 x USB C to USB C Gen2 10Gbps Cable (150MM) 1 x USB A to USB C Gen 2 10Gbps Cable (150MM) Available Capacity:250GB,500GB,1TB,2TB for your choice

Main Features SSD High Performance Chip With excellent master control and algorithms, this portable nvme SSD has a lower power consumption, lower heat, provides a reliable and stable reading and writing Indicator Shows the Data Transfer Status With LED Indicator, it is easy and clear to know the working status. Reduce false unplugging during data reading and writing, avoid data loss, and ensure data security. Build Strong and Secure This SSK portable SSD with solid aluminum shell, it is more resistant to shock, allowing it to withstand drops from 4 feet high, data is safer.

Expand Capacity for Smart Phone and Pad The OTG-enable mobile phone and pad can directly connect to SSD for file sharing, data transmission and video play back ect.,plug and play. Works with Multiple Devices Comes with two cables USB C to C cable and USB C to A cable, works with most USB devices, such as MacBook, Laptop, Pad Pro, OTG smart phone, Smart TV, Speaker ect. For Pad Pro, please find it under ‘File folder’. Fashion Design with Hanging Ring With strong tensile rubber hanging ring, sleek shape, it is easy to carry. Classic and fashion design, never out of style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing little device
reviews.reviewText: This thing is fantastic. The physical form factor is great -- perfectly small, subtle branding, no odd ports. The speed is way faster than I expected... and it doesn't overheat even under the heaviest of transfer workloads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with the speed and storage capacity!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Reads and writes as expected, seems very stable and very light weight. Doesn’t even seem to get hot at all. Already filled the first one. Will buy again!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Speed not as advertised
reviews.reviewText: OS: macos VenturaCapacity: 2TBInterface: Thunderbolt 3/USB4 (up to 40Gb/s)Tested using: AMorphous DiskMarkThis 2TB has a large # of flash die to parallelize read & write speeds. However, it does not deliver the promised performance. AT BEST it provided 600MB/s SEQUENTIAL read & write speeds if connected directly on the computer's USB-C (USB4/Thunderbolt (40Gb/s)) port. Using the hub I had access to (I had access to three of them), it delivered HALF (~300MB/s).It's compact & usable. Still, I'm returning it because at 2TB I need better performance as I expect to have it around for several years. And with future upgrades & workloads, this device will likely become a bottleneck (esp. as it gets closer to being filled).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This SSK Portable SSD 2TB External Drive Works Fine So Far
reviews.reviewText: The price was very competitive so I thought I'd try it and so far it works fine. On my Samsung Galaxy Book 2 with the Thunderbolt 4 port it gets consistent speeds hovering around 780MB/s but to a maximum of about 850MB/s. It is surprisingly small and light. The cord is short and stiff so the drive may not stay in a flat position but it's not an issue for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Is hard to believe that such a tiny device can be so quick and handle 2TB storage. I've had it for a week and it has worked flawlessly so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a budget SSD! And Tiny!
reviews.reviewText: Love the size of this hard drive for on the go back up for content. Total Bytes Written is 300 not to high but for the price it’s really good! Read/write speeds are as claimed for me on my MacBook Pro 2022

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small size makes it very easy to take anywhere
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this unit. I was looking for a portable high capacity drive for my videos and I’m pleased with the results.

reviews.reviewerName: Dobry miniaturowy młotek za swoje pieniądze, nie zajmuje dużo miejsca.

reviews.reviewText: Tested quickly on a Lenovo with thunderbolt and I got a good sustained 500 MB/s on pictures (lots of 1-2MB files). Good enough for me and way better than the previous one I had, especially for the price!

Ich habe mir die SSK SSD 2 TB zum black friday Preis von knapp 110 € geholt und bin absolut begeistert. Ausgepackt, angeschlossen und los ging's. Ich verwende sie um Xbox series x Spiele zwischenzuparken und der Transfer läuft mega schnell. Das Laufwerk ist ultra klein, so wie es auch in der Anzeige zu sehen ist. Ich würde von der Marke immer wieder Produkte kaufen. Über die Langlebigkeit kann ich bis jetzt nicht sagen, aber bei mir läuft sie jetzt knappe drei Wochen und ich hatte noch keine Probleme.
Petit, beau, de belle facture et surtout ultra rapide en transfert de données! Parfait pour les sauvegardes 👍
